title: Christiani Weisii Doctrina logica
creator: Weise, Christian
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Weise, Christian: Christiani Weisii Doctrina logica  Duabus Partibus sic comprehensa, Ut Prior Terminorum Simplicium, Propositioum & Syllogismorum notitiam; Posterior Ipsam Praxin in Definitione, Divisione, Demonstratione, Methodo, Interpretatione & Disputatione necessariam exhibeat ; Exemplis ut plurimum Politicis illustrata ; Rebusque oratoriis sedulo accomodata. Lipsiae 1711
